properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 29 at 2:05AM MST until March 2 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW AT TIMES WILL IMPACT AREAS ALONG AND
WEST OF THE LARAMIE RANGE SUNDAY THROUGH MONDAY MORNING...

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to
14 inches. Higher amounts on north facing slopes.

* WHERE...Snowy and Sierra Madre Ranges.

* WHEN...From 2 AM Sunday to 5 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Snowmobilers...hikers and other outdoor recreationists
can expect very poor visibility and may become disoriented and
lost. Travel on areas roads impacted by poor visibility and
slick snow covered surfaces.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY
